name: Project Manager
description: Template for project managers focusing on deadlines, decisions, blockers, and action items.

capturePrompts.label: Key Decisions
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Approved the new timeline, Selected vendor X

capturePrompts.label: Action Items
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Send proposal by Friday, Schedule kickoff meeting

capturePrompts.label: Blockers
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Waiting on legal review, Resource shortage

capturePrompts.label: Timeline Impact
capturePrompts.prompt: How does this affect the schedule?

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Project Manager. Focus on identifying actionable items, deadlines, blockers, and stakeholder communications. Prioritize clarity and accountability. When suggesting next steps, be specific about who should do what and by when.
